name: Niels Pilgaard
slogan: Passionate about learning and growing as a developer.
bio: I'm a C# developer, focused mostly on backend and automation. I particularly enjoy performance work, RabbitMQ and exploring new topics.

projects.name: Pilgaard.BackgroundJobs
projects.description: A dotnet library for running background jobs in a scalable and performant manner. The jobs can trigger based on cron expressions, intervals or absolute datetime.

projects.name: Mini Møder
projects.description: Helps parents find social connections for their children. A community for sharing and discovering playgroups, parenting groups, unschooling groups and like-minded parents.
